extendedInfo.description: *** This app could save your life (CBS, Knoxville TN)*** We give bSafe 5 stars out of 5 (www.tecca.com)*** What this little app can do is seriously awesome! (www.techmama.com)*** Every girl should get this app (www.nettenestea.com)*** bSafe can catch rapists (www.teknofil.no)bSafe is a #1 app. You can get it too for FREE!- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -Nervous when walking alone at night?Jogging or hiking on lonely trails?Ever begged for the phone to ring to get out of a situation?bSafe is what you need! This GPS-based safety alarm is packed features to make you safer. With bSafe you never walk alone!Set up your own safety network of friends and family members â as many as you want â and all will be notified in case of an emergency. Just push the big red SOS button to text/call them with information on your exact location and that you need help. It`s as simple as that!When walking alone you can ask selected friends to follow you LIVE from a distance with real-time GPS tracing, or if you are jogging or hiking you can program your bSafe SOS alarm to trigger automatically if you have not checked in within a predefined time. All developed to keep you safe!Ever been on a bad date or wanted to get out of another uncomfortable situation? With bSafe you can easily trigger a FAKE CALL straight away or in a selected few minutes.You get basic functionality for free, or subscribe to bSafe Premium for only $1.99/month for extra features. For more information visit http://neverwalkalone.com/- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -Free features:- One-click SOS alarm with GPS position- Fake Call- Iâm Here notification to Guardians- Test/demo optionPremium features:- SOS alarm with live GPS tracing, loud sound and video recording- Let friends walk you home from a distance using Follow Me with live GPS tracing- Follow Me also allows you to schedule an automatic alarm if you have not checked by a predefined time periodKeywords: Alone, Follow, Personal, Alarm ,Alert, App, Appilcation, Best, Bipper,be safe, besafe, b-safe, bsafe, Button, Call, Camera, Cell,Cellphone, Cheap, Communicate, Contact, Control, Convenient, CoordinatesDevice, Directions, Distress, Easy, Economical, Emergency, Evidence, Fear, Friend, GPS, Great, Handheld, Jada, Life, Location, Locator, Maps, Mobile, NAV, Navigation, Panic, Phone, Photo, Popular, Protect, Reliable, Report, Responsibility, Safe, Safety, Search, Security, Signal, Smartphone, Smith, SMS, SOS, Surveillance, Telenav, Track, TrafficingTXT, Usage, User-friendly, Video

reviews.title: Missing things
reviews.comment: This app is great don\'t get me wrong I love it. But Having to unlock my phone and open the app to press the button doesn\'t seem too convenient. Should at least have a type of widget, maybe even a key shortcut such as leaving the volume buttons pressed or so.
reviews.author: Elwiss E. Jimenez

reviews.title: Latitude and longitude?
reviews.comment: Really concerned this app gives out latitude and longitude as opposed to street addresses or street named. Is there a way to change that? I know it works with a GPS but, my guardians with nontech phones really can\'t help at all with that info except to relay it to police.
